Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph

Interface GraphUniverse.Builder

Enclosing interface:
GraphUniverse
public static interface GraphUniverse.Builder
A builder for GraphUniverses.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @NotNull GraphUniverse
    build(@NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier universeId)
    Builds the GraphUniverse described by this builder.
    @NotNull GraphUniverse.Builder
    saveMode(@NotNull SaveMode saveMode)
    Determines how often graphs and chunks should be saved.

  • Method Details

    • build

      @NotNull @NotNull GraphUniverse build(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier universeId)
      Builds the GraphUniverse described by this builder. Universes must be registered separately.

      Note: This does not register universes. Registration should be performed with the GraphUniverse.register() method.

      Parameters:
      universeId - the unique id of the universe to be built.
      Returns:
      the newly created GraphUniverse.

    • saveMode

      @NotNull @NotNull GraphUniverse.Builder saveMode(@NotNull @NotNull SaveMode saveMode)
      Determines how often graphs and chunks should be saved.

      By default, this is SaveMode.UNLOAD.

      Parameters:
      saveMode - the save mode for this universe.
      Returns:
      this builder for call chaining.
